description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Save your land by collecting the 3 discs of power. Stomp, crush, and plow through the insect menace to save your land. To destroy them, you must become them...via cool bug suits like the Beetle Suit, Grasshopper Suit, and Butterfly Suit.
description.short: Save your land by collecting the 3 discs of power. Stomp, crush, and plow through the insect menace to save your land. To destroy them, you must become them...via cool bug suits like the Beetle Suit, Grasshopper Suit, and Butterfly Suit.
